text: The Gran Premio Bruno Beghelli Internazionale Donne Elite is a women's one-day cycle race which starts and finishes in Monteveglio in Italy. It is currently rated by the UCI as category 1.1.http://women.cyclingfever.com/stage.html?etappe_idd=MzQ3OTc= ==Overall winners== ==References== Category:Women's cycle races Category:Cycle races in Italy
title: Gran Premio Bruno Beghelli Internazionale Donne Elite
